Apple News, Rumors, Reviews, Prices & Deals | AppleInsider https://appleinsider.comApple News, Rumors, Reviews, Prices & Deals | AppleInsider - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn 2023 年 7 月 12 日星期三 23:53:22 GMT 120 IAM CORE files another Unfair Labor Practice charge against Apple with NLRB

马里兰州陶森苹果商店于 2022 年首次与有组织零售员工联盟 (CORE) 下的国际航空航天工人 (IAM) 建立工会。据 IAM CORE 称，谈判于2023 年初开始，但实际上毫无进展。

IAM CORE 已向国家劳工关系委员会 (NLRB) 提交了第二份不公平劳工行为报告。第一份文件于2022 年 11 月提交，此前苹果公司隐瞒了非工会员工可获得的健康和教育福利信息。

IAM CORE 谈判委员会在一份声明中表示：“在整个过程中，IAM CORE 谈判委员会提出了公平的建议，并愿意在中间与苹果管理层会面。” “不幸的是，苹果公司继续拖延进展，并且远远没有履行真诚讨价还价的义务。”

“苹果不必重蹈星巴克和亚马逊的覆辙——他们可以而且应该做得更好，”声明继续说道。 “我们是苹果员工，希望让苹果成为一个更好的工作场所，我们呼吁管理层改变方针，真正努力达成公平协议。现在是苹果采取实际行动的时候了。”

AIM CORE 提交的新文件是在工会所谓的苹果公司进行了一系列恶意谈判之后提出的。据称，该公司在谈判期间多次引用苹果现有政策，而不是制定符合工会要求的新政策。

根据 IAM CORE 声明，苹果恶意讨价还价的例子包括：

  • 尽管谈判会议之间有一个月或更长时间的时间来制定提案，但公司始终只提出当前政策作为还价。
  • 苹果公司最近的一项管理权提案包含了之前公司提案的要点，清楚地表明了管理层的倒退讨价还价。
  • 苹果尚未对许多关键的工会提案做出回应，包括申诉程序、工会会费核销和工会安全。
  • 在坚持封闭谈判后，与全国各地的苹果员工分享内部谈判建议。
  • 不断迟到谈判桌，推迟返回谈判桌的日期和时间，并将谈判开始时间从2022年11月推迟到2023年1月。

苹果陶森工会之间的斗争才刚刚开始，如果能在不提起诉讼的情况下达成解决方案，可能需要很长时间才能解决。 IAM CORE 代表马里兰州陶森地点的 100 名员工。

谈判定于2023年8月15日继续进行。

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 23:48:56 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/iam-core-files-another-unfair-labor-practice-charge-against-apple-with-nlrb https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/iam-core-files-another-unfair-labor-practice-charge-against-apple-with-nlrb Wesley Hilliard Apple's Lisa Jackson talks racial equity and climate in new interview

丽莎·杰克逊 (Lisa Jackson) 是苹果公司负责环境、政策和社会倡议的副总裁，因此需要定期处理很多工作。不过，为此，她特别指出，即使是气候解决方案也需要“包括公平”，她指出所有这些努力都面临着一个重要的十字路口。

杰克逊与《华盛顿邮报》的乔纳森·卡普哈特进行了交谈，讨论了所有这些重大话题，包括苹果公司在种族股权投资方面的努力，以及美国最高法院涉及平权行动的一项重大裁决。

种族平等

事情要从苹果多年来在种族平等方面的投资开始，即几年前启动的种族平等和正义倡议。据苹果公司 6 月份的说法，自那时以来，该公司已为此投资了2 亿多美元。

杰克逊表示，苹果公司一开始的重点就是教育。她说，“教育是阶梯，是通往公平的道路”，并指出教育“可能最重要的支柱就是对教育的投资”。她指出，该公司于 2021 年在密歇根州底特律开设的开发者学院是苹果公司的一项重大举措。

苹果首席执行官蒂姆·库克 (Tim Cook) 认同杰克逊对教育的看法， 他表示，到2022 年，教育是“伟大的均衡器”。

至于最高法院关于平权行动的决定，苹果公司是向裁决机构提交法庭之友陈述的 70 家公司之一，认为大学招生中的平权行动应继续存在。

最高法院的决定摆脱了美国高等教育的种族意识决策。当被问及她是否担心这一决定将如何影响未来的招聘决定时，她说：

“当然，我们必须担心，因为继续关注包容性和多样性是我们的当务之急之一，我们会的。我们的价值观不会改变。因此，我们必须继续寻找方法，确保我们满足学生在哪里。”

钴与气候

谈到气候问题，卡普哈特询问了苹果公司在 iPhone 等设备的锂离子电池中使用钴的情况。不出所料，杰克逊重申了该公司已经公开表示的内容，即苹果将在 2025 年之前使用 100% 回收钴：

“到 2025 年，我们设计和规格的所有电池中的所有钴都将是回收钴。为什么？因为我们的战略很大一部分是因为这非常困难。多年来我们一直在努力确保我们知道包括钴在内的许多矿物的供应来自哪里。”
iPhone电池

她避免回答有关针对包括苹果在内的几家不同公司提起的诉讼的问题，这些诉讼涉及刚果共和国与钴开采有关的“残酷”童工法行为。

气候与公平

在上述十字路口，杰克逊被问到气候变化如何与种族和社会正义问题联系起来。卡普哈特想知道当前的气候是否会让集体行动变得更加困难。对此，杰克逊说道：

“听着，我不认为水和野火有种族之分。我真的不知道。我认为洪水就是洪水。很可能一些社区和有色人种社区——或者我会说经济贫困的社区资源不足可能会“在前线，但这并不能保护你。空气在吹。你知道，污染会移动。水往低处流。所以我们现在可以看看东北部正在发生的事情，看到它正在袭击各种社区。”

她在采访结束时谈到了社区，以及苹果公司对气候工作的关注（至少部分如此）。任何解决方案都需要考虑这些解决方案所在的社区。她补充说，“你不能进去决定保护一个地区，剥夺它的任何发展机会或潜力，然后对周围的社区说，祝你找到工作好运，你知道。”

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 22:45:23 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/apples-lisa-jackson-talks-racial-equity-and-climate-in-new-interview https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/apples-lisa-jackson-talks-racial-equity-and-climate-in-new-interview Evan Selleck Today is the last day to get this M2 MacBook Air with 16GB RAM for $1,149

1,149 美元的促销价由 Apple 授权经销商 B&H Photo 提供。这家电子产品零售商将流行的深空灰色配置降价了 150 美元，该配置采用苹果 M2 芯片，配备 8 核 GPU、16GB 内存和 256GB SSD。

与标准型号相比，这款 MacBook Air 的优势在于拥有额外的 RAM， AppleInsider读者专享折扣至 929 美元。

购买价格为 1,149 美元

B&H 直接与亚马逊展开竞争，在Prime Day上提供了一些我们见过的最激进的苹果优惠，其好处是可以选择升级型号——这是亚马逊不提供的。

您可以在我们的Mac 价格指南中找到所有优惠信息，该指南针对 Apple 生产的几乎所有配置提供了数百项独家优惠。

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 22:12:16 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/today-is-the-last-day-to-get-this-m2-macbook-air-with-16gb-ram-for-1149 https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/today-is-the-last-day-to-get-this-m2-macbook-air-with-16gb-ram-for-1149 Christine McKee Hongo 2K 16-inch portable monitor review: screen real estate on the cheap

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器具有良好的纸面规格，并提供不错的便携式游戏体验，但其低廉的价格带来了一些权衡。

显示器市场充满了选择，因此是一个很难竞争的地方。任何缺失的功能或小问题都可以通过以相同的价格选择不同的显示器来解决 - 因此每个微小的细节都很重要。

总体而言，Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器是一个不错的选择，并且价格仅为 200 美元。它轻薄，明亮的屏幕三侧边框极小。

对于那些需要在旅途中连接 MacBook 或 Nintendo Switch 的人来说，这款 Hongo 显示器是一个不错的选择。然而，这个价格范围可能提供适合更具体用例的解决方案。

在将显示器与iPad一起使用时，我们遇到了一个奇怪的问题，但这可能与 iPad 处理外部显示器的方式有关，而不是与显示器本身有关。很快会有更多相关内容。

Hongo 2K 16英寸便携式显示器

与许多计算机产品一样，这个名字就说明了一切。这是一款 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器，刷新率为 120Hz。

在某些照明条件下，哑光效果可能会很困难

它的长宽比为 16:10，为 2560 像素 x 1600 像素。这意味着 Hongo 无法与苹果的 Retina 显示屏相媲美，但价格为 200 美元，它也不必如此。

该显示屏具有哑光表面，这使得它的反射率低于玻璃表面。然而，直接光反射仍然会导致可见度问题。

Hongo 声称该显示屏具有 178 度视角、1200:1 对比度，并支持 100% sRGB 颜色。这些规格不会让您大吃一惊，但对于预算有限的便携式工作站来说已经足够了。

可轻松将 Hongo 便携式显示器装入 16 英寸笔记本电脑包中

该产品比大多数 16 英寸笔记本电脑更薄、更轻，因此可以放入背包的笔记本电脑内胆包中。其尺寸为 17.23 英寸 x 11.54 英寸 x 2.34 英寸，重量为 1.5 磅。

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器端口

有两个 USB-C 端口、一个 HDMI 端口、一个迷你 HDMI 端口和一个耳机插孔。产品的亚马逊页面或手册中未列出端口的规格。

我们测试了 USB-C 端口和全尺寸 HDMI 端口以进行审查。使用任一端口连接到 MacBook 时，显示器都表现良好，并在 sRGB 范围内显示准确的色彩。

两个 USB-C 和一个 HDMI

使用 USB-C 端口的好处是通过单根电缆将电源和视频数据传输到显示器。 MacBook 的 Thunderbolt 端口完全能够通过足够好的电缆运行 Hongo 显示器。

使用全尺寸 HDMI 端口时，USB-C 端口必须连接至至少 20W 的电源。如果显示器与 Nintendo Switch 一起使用，则至少需要两个 USB 电源。

我们还使用iPad Pro测试了显示器，得到了一些好坏参半的结果。通过扩展坞进行 HDMI 连接的效果与MacBook Pro一样好。

然而，与 iPad Pro 的 USB-C 连接表现不佳。 iPad Pro 为显示器供电并提供视频信号，但信号被冲掉了。

我们在显示器或 iPad 设置中所做的任何更改都无法解决颜色问题。这可能是 iPad 处理外部显示器方式的限制，因为用户无法指定颜色配置文件。

我们在通过 USB-C 连接到 iPad Pro 的其他显示器上没有遇到此问题。因此，我们不建议购买专门用于 iPad 的显示器，除非使用扩展坞和 HDMI。

使用 Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器

Hongo 显示器大多是即插即用的。它会根据连接的内容自动显示图片，因此用户无需摆弄切换输入，除非连接了多个设备。

设置控件导航起来可能很麻烦

有一个用于控制亮度、颜色和其他方面的菜单，但用户不需要多次使用它。不过，弄清楚如何浏览菜单是一个学习曲线。

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器具有类似于 Apple iPad 保护套的磁性盖。它粘在显示器的背面并向下折叠以在两个视角下支撑显示器。

那些寻求更持久解决方案的人可以使用 75 毫米 x 75 毫米 VESA 孔。当连接到 MacBook 时，它还可以用作垂直显示器。

金属后面板符合 VESA 标准

这款显示器并没有什么过于复杂或令人惊讶的地方。一旦所有东西都插入，它就会完成它的工作。

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器 - 附加屏幕房地产

有时您只需要一台可以轻松移动的更大的显示器 - 无论是到您的隔壁房间还是咖啡店。 Hongo 便携式显示器售价 200 美元，是一个不错的解决方案。

虽然 iPad 用户不会获得最优质的单电缆体验，但所有其他用例都得到了很好的覆盖。我们特别喜欢的是，在Genki 适配器的帮助下，这是将我们的 Nintendo Switch 变成 16 英寸便携式游戏机的快速方法。

Mac 和 Nintendo Switch 与 Hongo 便携式显示器配合使用效果最佳

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器 — 优点

  • 薄、轻、便携
  • 快速设置
  • 适用于 Mac 的一根电缆设置
  • 良好的便携式游戏解决方案

Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器 — 缺点

  • 磨砂显示屏并不理想，在光面 Mac 和 iPad 面前显得很明显
  • USB-C 与 iPad Pro 的兼容性不佳
  • 这种尺寸的磁性盖可能会很​​尴尬
  • HDR 选项也可能不存在，与大多数其他廉价显示器一样，​​它会使图像质量恶化

评分 3 分（满分 5 分）

有很多类似规格的便携式显示器，价格在 200 美元左右。 Hongo 并没有试图以华而不实的功能脱颖而出，它作为一种即插即用的解决方案运行良好。

更多的钱会给你带来更多的规格、功能，甚至可能带来更好的 iPad 体验。所以，这个分数可以轻松地落在 3 分上。

哪里可以买到 Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器

在亚马逊上购买 Hongo 2K 16 英寸便携式显示器，价格为 199.99 美元。它有时会在促销中出现，在Prime Day发布时售价为 159.99 美元。

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 21:49:10 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/hongo-2k-16-inch-portable-monitor-review-screen-real-estate-on-the-cheap https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/hongo-2k-16-inch-portable-monitor-review-screen-real-estate-on-the-cheap Wesley Hilliard Pristine condition AirPods Max refurbished models are just $369.99

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 21:01:34 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/pristine-condition-airpods-max-refurbished-models-are-just-36999 https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/pristine-condition-airpods-max-refurbished-models-are-just-36999 Amanda Laskin Apple reissues Rapid Security Response for iOS 16.5.1 and macOS 13.4.1

Apple's Rapid Security Response (RSR) is a standard part of the company's security updates system. The whole point is to quickly address significant issues related to the software without forcing end users to wait for a full update.

However, when Apple issued the RSR for supported iPhones , iPads, and Macs, the company quickly pulled the new software following complaints that major websites were blocking Safari users from accessing content.

Apple confirmed it would reissue the updates soon, and Aaron Zollo was the first to notice the new updates being available now.

While the revised RSR is available now to download for iOS 16.5.1, iPadOS 16.5.1, and macOS 13.4.1, Apple has not updated its official security updates page as of the time of publication. It's expected the revised update will patch the same security issues the first update was meant to address.

WebKit

  • Available for: iOS 16.5.1, iPadOS 16.5.1, and macOS Ventura 13.4.1
  • Impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
  • Description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.
  • CVE-2023-37450: an anonymous researcher

Apple devices are configured to implement Rapid Security Responses as the default setting automatically. If needed, users will receive a prompt to restart their device.

To enable "Security Responses & System Files" on an iPhone or iPad, navigate to Settings, then select General, followed by Software Update. From there, access Automatic Updates and ensure the toggle is turned on.

For Mac users, open the Apple menu by clicking on the Apple logo, then select System Settings. In the Settings window, click on General and Software Update, then Automatic Updates, and make sure the toggle is turned on for "Install Security Responses and system files."

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 20:48:16 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/apple-reissues-rapid-security-response-for-ios-1651-and-macos-1341 https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/apple-reissues-rapid-security-response-for-ios-1651-and-macos-1341 Evan Selleck macOS Sonoma brings iCloud Password extension to third-party browsers

Apple wants to make it easy to manage passwords, and not just within its own software and apps. For example, in 2021 the company launched an official iCloud Passwords extension for Google's Chrome on Windows, broadening the availability of iCloud Keychain.

Apple also has the same extension available for Microsoft's Edge on Windows as well. It's all very easy to use .

And that effort is broadening even more with the future launch of macOS Sonoma later this year. The first public beta of macOS Sonoma brings with it the ability for users to add the iCloud Passwords extension to Chrome on Mac.

The feature was announced during WWDC week, but a member of the passwords team at Apple highlighted the feature again now that the public betas are out.

macOS Sonoma brings Apple's password manager to Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and other browsers using their extensions stores with the "iCloud Passwords" browser extension.

If you're running the macOS Sonoma public or developer beta, you can try it right now! [1/n] pic.twitter.com/stkbQqFtfx

— Ricky Mondello (@rmondello) July 12, 2023

Mondello notes that support for additional extension stores is present, meaning the iCloud Passwords extension should work for web browsers like Edge on Mac in the future, just like on Windows.

The iCloud Passwords extension for Chrome on Mac is available in the latest developer beta for macOS Sonoma as well.

With this extension, it goes beyond simply storing passwords. It supports auto-filling passwords on websites while using web browsers and also the ability to autofill one-time codes. Users can right-click on a QR code to set up code generation, and it also supports saving new passwords.

And, of course, these saved passwords are available in iCloud, meaning they'll be available on your Apple-branded products.

This isn't the only work Apple is doing to help smooth over using passwords. macOS Sonoma makes it much easier to share passwords and usernames right from within Safari , so family and friends get right to the information without any additional clicks on the user's part.

macOS Sonoma is expected to launch in the fall of 2023.

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 20:11:18 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/macos-sonoma-brings-icloud-password-extension-to-third-party-browsers https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/macos-sonoma-brings-icloud-password-extension-to-third-party-browsers Evan Selleck Last call for these Prime Day 2023 Apple Watch deals

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 17:42:03 GMT https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/bh-photo-makes-a-strong-case-for-upgrading-your-apple-gear-with-up-to-2000-off-devices https://appleinsider.com/articles/23/07/12/bh-photo-makes-a-strong-case-for-upgrading-your-apple-gear-with-up-to-2000-off-devices Michael Stroup How to install the iOS 17 public beta

We've been testing iOS 17 for the past month on the initial developer beta and have come to appreciate so many of the new features.

StandBy mode is incredible, allowing us to show widgets, Live Activities, photos, or the time when our iPhone is connected to our MagSafe chargers. AirPods Pro have a new Adaptive Mode to blend Transparency Mode and ANC as your environment changes.

Widgets can now be interactive on your Home Screen and don't have to launch an app while AirDrop is a newly revamped experience. When used with Apple TV , we can now take FaceTime calls in our living room.

Before the software is released to everyone, Apple rolls out a series of beta updates. Betas initially were seeded to developers but now, Apple has opened them up to public beta testers for free.

在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider
在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider

Users will have the chance to try all the new features before anyone else. Aside from iOS 17, users can also test watchOS 10 , macOS Sonoma, HomePod software, tvOS 17 , and iPadOS 17 .

Compared to years past, the process has changed slightly. Here's how it works now.

How to install the iOS 17 public beta

  1. Visit beta.apple.com
  2. Sign in with your Apple ID. Note: You don't need to use the same Apple ID as you use to sign in to your phone, but it can make it easier
  3. On your iPhone, go to Settings >; General >; Software Update
  4. It may take a moment, but below Automatic Updates a new option will appear for beta updates
  5. In this menu you can choose between off and the iOS Public Beta
  6. If you used a different Apple ID to sign up for the beta program, this is where you can sign in with that secondary ID
  7. Go back to the Software Update page and it will automatically refresh and show any available beta update

Full release this fall

Apple will release iOS 17 this fall, alongside its other major software platforms. Keep glued to AppleInsider for further coverage of Apple's beta progress as we march towards the release.

; Wed, 12 Jul 2023 17:39:15 GMT https://appleinsider.com/inside/ios-17/tips/how-to-install-the-ios-17-public-beta https://appleinsider.com/inside/ios-17/tips/how-to-install-the-ios-17-public-beta Andrew O'Hara Apple releases first public betas of tvOS 17 and watchOS 10

The forthcoming operating systems from Apple are set to introduce a range of exciting features, elevating the user experience across diverse applications. Those interested in obtaining the latest operating systems can access them through the Apple Beta Software Program , enabling them to explore the new enhancements.

The first public beta for tvOS 17 has a build number of 21J5303h and the build number for watchOS 10 is 21R5305e. Apple released the first public betas for iOS 17 and macOS Sonoma on July 12 .

tvOS 17

视频对话

  • Apple TV now integrates with the iPhone camera through the Continuity Camera feature on tvOS 17, bringing the FaceTime app to the set-top box.
  • In 2023, video conferencing apps like Cisco's Webex and Zoom will be introduced on tvOS, enabling Apple TV 4K users to access their communication features directly.
在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider
在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider

Control Center and Profiles

  • With the introduction of tvOS 17, the Control Center undergoes a significant overhaul, prioritizing enhanced user convenience.
  • By implementing fast Profile switching, users can wake up the Apple TV using the remote app in the iPhone's Control Center, automatically transitioning to their respective profiles.
  • With the arrival of tvOS 17, customized settings for profiles are now stored individually for each user.

Find My Siri Remote

  • You can locate second-generation or newer models of the Siri Remote using the Find My app.

一般特征

  • Enhance Dialogue : This capability allows Apple TV users to enhance the clarity of dialogue in movies or TV shows on Apple TV 4K when paired with HomePod (2nd generation).
  • Dolby Vision 8.1 support : Apple TV 4K users can now enjoy an enhanced cinematic visual experience across a wider selection of movies and TV shows, thanks to the inclusion of dynamic metadata.
  • Apple Fitness+ : These additions encompass Custom Plans, a novel approach for Fitness+ users to receive personalized workout or meditation schedules tailored to specific days, durations, workout types, and more. Stacks enable users to select and perform multiple consecutive workouts and meditations effortlessly. Audio Focus also empowers users to prioritize the music volume or the trainers' voices according to their preference.
  • Third-party VPN apps support : This empowers developers to build VPN apps specifically designed for Apple TV, which can be advantageous for enterprise and education users seeking access to content on their private networks.

The Apple TV models that will support tvOS 17 include Apple TV HD (2015) and all three generations of Apple TV 4K.

watchOS 10

表盘

  • Snoopy and Woodstock : These characters will respond to the weather conditions and even engage in physical activities alongside you.
  • Palette : This functionality enables you to perceive time as a spectrum of exquisite colors that transition dynamically throughout the day.

骑自行车

  • Bluetooth Accessories : The watch will seamlessly establish connections with Bluetooth-enabled accessories, integrating cadence, speed, and power data into your Workout View automatically.
  • Power Zones Workout View : Upon detecting a power meter, the Apple Watch will estimate your Functional Threshold Power and display the corresponding performance zone, aiding in the enhancement of your overall performance.
  • Optimized Metrics for iPhone : Initiate a cycling workout from your Apple Watch, and it will automatically appear as a Live Activity on your iPhone.
在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider
在 YouTube 上订阅 AppleInsider

远足

  • Compass App : This application now incorporates a three-dimensional perspective of your past locations through Elevation View, as well as estimates the locations of your last cellular reception using Cellular Connectivity Waypoints.
  • Trail Information : You can search for and explore significant information about nearby trails located in the United States.
  • Topographic Maps : Embark on an exploration of mountains, valleys, lakes, and rivers across the United States, featuring detailed information such as trails, contour lines, elevation data, and notable points of interest.

精神健康

  • Mood Logging : Browse captivating visuals to assist you in choosing and recording your current emotions and daily mood effectively.
  • Insights : Within the Health app on your iPhone or iPad, observe the potential connections between your mental state and lifestyle factors, such as exposure to daylight, sleep duration, exercise, and moments of mindfulness.

Vision Health

  • Reducing the Risk of Nearsightedness : The Apple Watch's ambient light sensor can now measure daylight duration. With Family Setup, parents can monitor this information, even if their child doesn't possess an iPhone.

苹果健身+

  • Custom Plans : Choose your individual workout preferences, and Fitness+ will generate a personalized plan to help you stay focused and motivated. The Stacks feature allows you to combine multiple workouts and meditations effortlessly, enabling a smooth transition to your next activity.

All Apple Watch models supporting watchOS 9 are compatible with watchOS 10, including the Apple Watch Series 4 and later, Apple Watch Ultra , and Apple Watch SE (both generations).
